properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 9 at 3:55AM PST until February 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Las Vegas NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two
inches. North winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Yucca Valley and parts of the Morongo Basin above 3000
feet MSL.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 4 PM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads
and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 4 PM PST MONDAY
